name: DC Chain Drive Wi-Fi® Garage Door Opener with Integrated Bluetooth® Technology
description: The LiftMaster 81600 is a quiet DC chain drive garage door opener featuring integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for seamless connectivity. It offers reliable performance, smart control via the myQ app, and enhanced security features with a powerful chain drive system.
shortDescription: DC chain drive Wi-Fi opener with Bluetooth, myQ integration, and quiet operation for dependable garage control.
features: DC Motor: Purposefully designed for quiet performance
myQ® Connected: Control, secure, and monitor the garage from the myQ app anytime, from anywhere
Secure in-garage delivery: Enables Amazon Key In-Garage Delivery (free for Prime members)
Security+ 2.0®: Sends a new code with every remote click
Invisible light beam safety system with auto-reverse
PosiLock® electronic protection against forced openings
Integrated Bluetooth technology: Reduces setup time and easier connection to myQ app and smart home devices
Powerful chain drive: Rugged steel construction with precision fabrication for dependable performance
myQ Diagnostics: Real-time health reports and alerts for garage door issues

specifications.motor: 12V DC, 53 RPM, automatic thermal protection, permanent lubrication
specifications.mechanics: Steel chassis, T-rail and trolley, full chain drive (63:1 gear reduction), auto-force adjustment, electronic limits, DC Wi-Fi logic board with built-in surge suppressor
specifications.power: 120V AC, 60 Hz, 2.7A current rating, UL Listed
specifications.speed: 8.5 inches per second upward, 6.5 inches per second downward
specifications.lighting: Max. 1 x 100-watt lightbulb; Adjustable-time solid-state delay; Enhanced CFL compatible, max. 26 watts

inTheBox: The Protector System® Safety Reversing Sensors
